captions.text:
lf you and l were married,
l would want to give you what you need.

That's all. l'm talking about taking
care of each other the best you can.

What's wrong with taking care
of a woman ? She takes care of you.

You'll have a hard time finding
a woman like that these days.

- Shoot, you think so ?
- Mm-hmm.

l don't know.
Lightning could strike.
l've gotta go.

- Yeah. Listen, did l say
something wrong ? No ?
- No.

- No. No. It was--
- Sure ?

lt was so right, it scares me.
That's all.
Just--

You know, l was thinking,
l don't want you to be my doctor.

l don't want you to...
examine me and--
Why ?
Because l like you so much.
[ Chuckles ]

And l-- l don't want
to examine you.
You don't ? Why not ?

- Because l like you so much.
- [ Both Laughing ]
Oh, boy. Okay.
Now l gotta go, so--

- Yep, understood.
- All right. All right.
Fair enough. See ya.

- Bye. Bye.
- Bye-bye.
[ Car Horn Blaring ]
[ Brakes Screeching ]

comments.text:
I think people are too cynical and dead inside, which is why this movie's 
so underrated. Claire Forlani was just so radiant and cute and I'm sure 
Brad Pitt does the same for most ladies as Forlani did for me. But they 
brought great acting chops along with the looks. A few greats in the 
supporting casts, incl. obviously Anthony Hopkins. More intelligent than 
the most rom-coms and even the ending did not stoop to the average 
Hollywood fare. There's an artistic beauty to go with it all.﻿
